ModMetaData.name: DraftedWaitFacePath(征召待机时朝向路径)
ModMetaData.author: Miao(ftianf)
ModMetaData.description: A very simple mod, which is used to match my StandMasterMod，Or it can also assist in some still performance shooting. Draft Colonists moved Will look in the final direction of movement,Instead of looking at the camera I operate on IL，No runtime performance loss。 很简单的一个小mod，本身用来搭配我的替身使者Mod，或者也可以辅助进行一些静止演出拍摄。 征召小人待机移动后将看向最后移动的方向，而非自动看向摄像机。 本身对IL进行Transpiler操作所以没有性能损耗。
